38705 40415 They'd never make it in time,

466549 468593 Everyone else, out of the car.

484693 486653 Put your hands

545378 548673 trying to rake the LAPD

560643 563396 to scrunch his ass

658450 659993 Yeah. I got a pretty good idea.

723098 725100 judging by how scared I am.

827202 829287 to find the tape

834334 835502 or who might've wired up Iris.

874374 877377 and the goddamn media

897272 899691 The issue is whether

905905 908241 but don't walk near me

908324 910660 The only card

913913 916166 Run that on

916249 918084 by midnight, you've got

918168 919711 They'll see the smoke in Canada.

919794 922881 What the hell are you saying...

922964 924549 - I didn't say that.

925842 929054 one of the most important

972806 975642 Yeah, you're not rid of me
976351 979521 No, you're not rid of me

987946 990198 Till you say, don't you wish you

1007298 1008758 Don't you, don't you wish you
1011219 1012345 Don't you, don't you wish you

you scared the fuck out of me!

1048173 1050508 You got to trust us.

1052677 1054054 All right.
I'll talk to you alone.

1070111 1073406 He's such a controlfreak, he's

1081498 1083541 He was afraid Jeriko

1083625 1086920 but he wasn't sure, so he starts

1087003 1089756 A couple of nights ago,

1089839 1091758 and he sends her
and the other girl, Diamanda...
1103937 1106189 I got a present for you.

1110318 1112904 So that night,

1114322 1116908 She comes over,

1118201 1121246 He can't believe the disaster

1121329 1123540 He's afraid the cops

1123623 1126668 who she's been working for

1130171 1132007 Why didn't he just

1135885 1138430 he'd lose all his other acts,

1161828 1163997 So he gives Iris some money.

1164080 1167292 He tells her to check into

1167375 1169252 until he can figure out
what to do.
1169336 1170962 He figured out what to do.

1172839 1175008 The killer knew where she was

1179179 1181598 I don't know where
the fuck she is, but we're late.

1182766 1186644 Philo, how do you want me

1186686 1189397 Want me downstairs at the party

1190857 1192692 Leave here with me right now.

1209876 1212837 OK, man.

go out for a pass, bro.
1223390 1227102 No white clouds in my blue sky
1238988 1240865 Get out of my fuckin' way!
1253253 1254671 Get out of my fuckin' way!

1276860 1278486 Get out of the way! Look out!

1281781 1283283 Get out of my fucking way!

1343843 1346346 See you up there in a bit,

1373456 1375500 Give him the clip.

1376793 1378753 I know he'll go for it,

1382048 1383967 Just get your butt down here.

1392058 1393226 If he gives us any shit...
1399065 1400483 We got to get over there.

1412162 1414080 It's a setup. Think about it.

1415832 1417876 To get you to rush in...

1417917 1420420 put a bullet in you, one in her,

1429929 1432098 What the fuck are you doing?

1443943 1446112 Time to get real, not playback.

1462671 1465340 They're designed that way

1468843 1470637 Have you ever been
in love with...

1482982 1485652 Didn't stop you
from loving them, right?

1495662 1497956 Didn't stop you
from wanting to protect them...

1509509 1511845 When I met Faith,
she was just another...

1514723 1517308 giving twenty-dollar blow jobs

1523606 1525984 And she had this voice
that was...

1530947 1533283 Like she could take
all the hurt and rage...

1534951 1537287 and lift it up to heaven

I'll always just be there...

1551009 1552927 See, it's not about
what's in her head.
1555805 1557766 I can't let go of the promise.
1559351 1561853 It's like it's all I have left.
1665832 1667250 The end of the world, yeah!
1685894 1687479 You look great in that dress.
1688855 1690148 I mean, better than I would.

1720970 1723014 for getting into the most
sold-out party in history?

1779446 1782198 All right.

1782282 1784200 Gant's got what I want.
I've got what he wants.

1784284 1786494 This is the original.
There are no copies.
1786578 1788455 That's why it's a makeable deal.

1788538 1792083 This tape is a lightning bolt
from God.

1792167 1794836 It's worth more than you,
more than me...

1798131 1800425 It can change things
that need changing...

1800467 1802802 before we all go off

1802844 1805972 You do not have the right

1812187 1814147 a lot more than you know...

1814189 1817275 which makes us both

1817359 1819319 But if you pawn this tape...
1851518 1852936 You see that guy over there?

1856690 1858274 the sanctimonious prick

1859526 1861820 when he farts

1865657 1867659 You want me to trust a cop?

1917667 1920170 there's a clip in here

1922005 1924257 If it weren't New Year's Eve,

2442400 2443860 I sent her to the party.

2485485 2488863 lfeel like I gotta share this

2500000 2502127 but I also got to do

2502210 2504671 'cause she knows the score,

2507465 2509884 So I say to myself,

2516016 2517642 To buy time, I do the skank...

2517726 2520186 but I still got

2526609 2530739 than his girlfriend's loser

2586753 2588880 'cause some shitbird can

2588922 2590048 in the back of your head...

2602894 2606022 only Faith knows me from you.

2606106 2609609 So she comes up to me and says,

2609693 2613571 And I say, "I'll buy you

2623498 2626710 I don't always do what I'm told.

2629921 2632048 Come on, Max. Play with me.

2640348 2643226 "because I like the feeling

3058099 3059726 Let me tell you
what's going on here.
3060560 3061895 Let me tell you what's going on.
3065940 3067567 Let me tell you what happened!
3078620 3080663 Get these fucking things off me!

3203370 3205372 That is the cause of all this!

3222514 3224391 Read them their rights! Move it!

3228561 3229979 Anything you say can and will
